import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Timer.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Timer=_ref=>{let{minutes,onComplete}=_ref;const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState(minutes*60);const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{let timer;if(isRunning&&timeLeft>0){timer=setInterval(()=>{setTimeLeft(prev=>prev-1);},1000);}else if(timeLeft===0){setIsRunning(false);if(onComplete)onComplete();}return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[isRunning,timeLeft,onComplete]);const formatTime=secs=>{const m=Math.floor(secs/60);const s=secs%60;return"".concat(m,":").concat(s<10?"0":"").concat(s);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timer-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"timer-title",children:"Focus Timer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"timer-display",children:formatTime(timeLeft)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timer-buttons",children:[!isRunning&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsRunning(true),className:"start-btn",children:"Start"}),isRunning&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsRunning(false),className:"pause-btn",children:"Pause"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setIsRunning(false);setTimeLeft(minutes*60);},className:"reset-btn",children:"Reset"})]})]});};export default Timer;
